about_the_game:
"

Rifts: The Garnet Town Gambit (Revised Edition) (SWADE Edition)



Explore the world of Rifts(R) using the Savage Worlds system!A small town is caught in the middle between different groups wanting to exploit the region. Heroes of the Tomorrow Legion arrive just in time to make a difference in this settlement's future. But first, the Legionnaires have to deal with various threats that could wipe this town off the map!This item requires the
Savage Worlds core rules,
Rifts(R): The Tomorrow Legion Player's Guide, and
Rifts(R): Game Master's Handbook to play.Rifts(R) and Megaverse(R) are Registered Trademarks of Palladium Books, Inc. All character names and likenesses are copyright and trademarks owned by Palladium Books, Inc. and used under license. "
